channel.title: Aprio Voice
channel.description:
Aprio Strategic Communications

Delivering considered, contextual strategic communications advice.

The Aprio team is a group of skilled, experienced and highly-regarded communications specialists and our strategically-minded team of experts allows us to deliver and implement strategies in key business areas such as investor relations, crisis and issue communications, digital strategy and content creation, and training and development.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Delivering considered, contextual strategic communications advice.
channel.itunes:author: Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.author: aprio-voice@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: History of Content Marketing | Mark Leighton (Aprio | Content Marketing Specialist)
item.itunes:title: History of Content Marketing | Mark Leighton (Aprio | Content Marketing Specialist)
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn more about digital magazines
item.description:
In this episode Alan Arguile speaks to Mark Leighton, Aprio’s content-marketing specialist. Mark has decades of experience in publishing and using high-quality content to build brands and deliver effective campaigns. Here he speaks to Alan about the history and function of content marketing, and about a recent addition to the stable of communications platforms: the digital magazine.


Visit the Aprio website https://aprio.co.za/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:

item.author: aprio-voice@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Investor Relations | Lydia du Plessis (Aprio | IR Specialist)
item.itunes:title: Investor Relations | Lydia du Plessis (Aprio | IR Specialist)
item.itunes:subtitle: IR is not PR
item.description:
In this episode Alan Arguile speaks to Lydia du Plessis, one of Aprio’s investor relations (IR) experts, about the way in which IR differs from public relations and other communications functions, its tangible value, how it ought to be measured, top IR tips for listed companies, and more.


Connect with Lydia du Plessis on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/lydiaduplessis/


Visit the Aprio website https://aprio.co.za/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: aprio-voice@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Share Price and Corporate Communication | Troye Brady (Aprio | Research Analyst)
item.itunes:title: Share Price and Corporate Communication | Troye Brady (Aprio | Research Analyst)
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn more about the uniqueness of South Africa’s financial market
item.description:
In this episode Alan Arguile speaks to Troye Brady, Aprio’s in-house research analyst, about the function of his weekly and monthly reports to JSE-listed clients, the uniqueness of South Africa’s financial markets as well as the relationship between share prices and corporate communication.


Connect with Troye Brady on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/troye-brady-83425021/


Visit the Aprio website https://aprio.co.za/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: aprio-voice@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Aprio | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Media Preparedness Training | Alan Arguile
item.itunes:title: Media Preparedness Training | Alan Arguile
item.itunes:subtitle: With Alan Arguile
item.description:
Welcome to Aprio Voice, a podcast in which the Aprio team explore topics in corporate communications and investor relations. In this episode one of our writers, Dan Maré, speaks to Alan Arguile about what it takes to be an effective communicator in today's media landscape, and lessons learnt from the more than 900 media training sessions Alan's conducted in his career.


Connect with Alan Arguile on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/alan-arguile-68915216/


Visit the Aprio website https://aprio.co.za/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
